item.title: 马斯克的人工智能 Grok 在 X 上每小时生成数千张脱衣图片
item.description: 据第三方分析，埃隆-马斯克的 X 已成为人工智能非自愿脱衣图片的热门网站，在本周早些时候的一天里，每小时都有数千个实例。【原文：Elon Musk’s X has become a top site for images of people that have been non-consensually undressed by AI, according to a third-party analysis, with thousands of instances each hour over a day earlier this week.】

item.title: 中国审查 Meta 20 亿美元收购人工智能初创公司 Manus 的交易
item.description: 中国官员正在调查 Meta Platforms 公司收购人工智能初创公司 Manus 的交易是否违反了国家安全或技术出口法规。【原文：Chinese officials are looking into whether Meta Platforms Inc.’s acquisition of artificial intelligence startup Manus violated national security or technology export regulations, an initial review that could hinder the deal down the road if officials determine wrongdoing.】

item.title: 印度在经历动荡之年后预计经济增长 7.4
item.description: 印度政府预计，尽管与美国的贸易关系紧张，印度在截至 3 月份的财政年度中仍将增长 7.4%，继续保持其世界增长最快的主要经济体的地位。【原文：The Indian government expects growth of 7.4% in the financial year through March, maintaining its status as the world’s fastest-growing major economy despite trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 加纳通胀降至多年低点，减息希望大增
item.description: 加纳的年通货膨胀率降至 2002 年以来的最低水平，这为央行在本月晚些时候召开会议时再次降息提供了空间。【原文：Ghana’s annual inflation rate slowed to its lowest level since 2002, providing room for the central bank to cut interest rates again when it meets later this month.】

item.title: 人工智能 "疲劳 "让投资者关注 S&P 公司的其他 493 种股票
item.description: 三年来，对人工智能公司的押注主导了美国股市，推动股市上涨了 78%。现在，越来越多的投资者打赌，由 "华丽七侠 "领衔的这波上涨行情即将结束。【原文：Bets on artificial intelligence companies have dominated US equity markets for three years, powering a 78% gain. A growing number of investors are now wagering that run, led by the Magnificent Seven, is about to end.】

item.title: 交易员加大对欧洲央行降息的押注，德国债券跳涨
item.description: 德国政府债券周三扩大涨幅，原因是疲软的经济数据促使交易商加大了对降息的押注，抵消了债务销售大幅增长的前景。【原文：German government bonds extended gains on Wednesday as weak economic data prompted traders to increase their bets on rate cuts, offsetting the prospect of a jump in debt sales.】

item.title: Stellantis 联盟称 2025 年意大利汽车产量将下降 25
item.description: 去年，Stellantis NV 在意大利的汽车产量下滑了近四分之一，这凸显了在政治领导人的推动下，在原有生产基地重振制造业的艰难历程。【原文：Stellantis NV’s car production in Italy slumped by nearly a quarter last year, highlighting the struggle to revive manufacturing at its original sites with political leaders pushing for commitments to keep factories running.】

item.title: 百年基金捐款使英国债务减少 6.07 亿英镑
item.description: 英国正在利用近 100 年前成立的一个慈善基金的资金，从国债中拿出一小部分。【原文：The UK is using money from a charitable fund established nearly 100 years ago to take a small bite out of the national debt.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀回落至欧洲央行目标水平，支持维持利率不变
item.description: 欧元区通胀率回落至欧洲央行的目标水平，这支持了政策制定者的观点：除非经济前景发生重大变化，否则利率可维持在当前水平。【原文：Euro-area inflation eased to the European Central Bank’s target, supporting the view of policymakers that interest rates can stay at current levels unless the economic outlook changes significantly.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉和格陵兰岛风波为国防类股票注入新动力
item.description: 美国对委内瑞拉的突袭以及唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对格陵兰岛计划的紧张局势重新聚焦了全球军费开支，为欧洲国防股的反弹注入了新的动力。【原文：The US raid on Venezuela and tensions over Donald Trump’s plans for Greenland have refocused attention on global military spending, handing fresh impetus to Europe’s rallying defense stocks.】

item.title: 多伦多房市2025年收官：价格与销量双双下滑
item.description: 多伦多12月房屋销量与价格双双下滑，为全年低迷的购房需求画上句号，这主要源于与美国的贸易紧张局势。【原文：Toronto home sales and prices declined in December, capping off a year of tepid buyer interest as a result of trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 德国牙医养老基金因10亿欧元亏损起诉顾问公司
item.description: 一家德国养老基金因涉足私募市场导致逾10亿欧元（11.7亿美元）亏损，现已对前审计机构、顾问公司及自身管理层提起法律诉讼，以追偿损失。【原文：A German pension fund whose foray into private markets led to losses of more than €1 billion ($1.17 billion) has begun legal proceedings against its former auditor, an adviser and its own managers to recover the damages.】

item.title: 全球最高垂直农场落户进口依赖型新加坡
item.description: 新加坡周三启用了全球最高的垂直农场，该城市国家正努力减少对进口食品的依赖。【原文：Singapore opened the world’s tallest vertical farm on Wednesday, as the city-state tries to reduce its reliance on imported food.】

item.title: 世界需要更多铜。但供应量是否足够？
item.description: 铜是世界上最普遍的金属之一，几乎所有带电设备都离不开它：智能手机、冰箱、电动汽车、电网等等。【原文：Copper is one of the world’s most ubiquitous metals, used in just about everything that’s electrified: smartphones, refrigerators, electric vehicles, power grids and much more.】

item.title: 英国房屋建设量创2020年新冠封锁以来最大跌幅
item.description: 一项备受关注的调查显示，英国房屋建设速度出现自首次新冠封锁以来的最大降幅，这表明工党政府未能实现其加速建设目标。【原文：UK housebuilding dropped at the fastest pace since the first Covid lockdown, according to a closely watched survey that suggests the Labour government is failing to achieve its goal of turbocharging construction.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Enko 在与美元挂钩的繁荣之年后为 2026 年的非洲风险打出旗号
item.description: 对冲基金 Enko Capital Management LLP 认为，非洲信贷市场可能会让希望重现去年辉煌回报的投资者失望。【原文：African credit markets may disappoint investors hoping for a repeat of last year’s stellar returns, according to hedge fund Enko Capital Management LLP, which is seeking out trades to cushion against setbacks in the continent’s top performing assets.】

item.title: 蓝思科技董事会否决钢铁动力公司和 SGH 公司价值 88 亿美元的收购案
item.description: 博思格钢铁有限公司（BlueScope Steel Ltd.）拒绝了美国钢铁制造商钢铁动力公司（Steel Dynamics Inc.【原文：BlueScope Steel Ltd. rejected an $8.8 billion takeover bid by US steelmaker Steel Dynamics Inc. and Australian conglomerate SGH Ltd.】

item.title: 中国人民银行连续第 14 个月增持黄金，黄金价格屡创新高
item.description: 随着金价飙升至创纪录水平，中国央行将其连续购买黄金的时间延长至 14 个月，这凸显了官方对金银的持续需求。【原文：China’s central bank extended its gold-buying streak to 14 months, underscoring sustained official demand for bullion as prices surge to record.】

item.title: 2025 年通胀和网络攻击后，英国食品杂货商利润将大幅增长
item.description: 在经历了持续的食品通胀、与廉价竞争对手的竞争以及一次重大网络攻击之后，英国食品杂货商的收益在 2026 年将有所提高。【原文：British grocers are set for improving earnings in 2026 after a year marked by persistent food inflation, rivalry with cheaper competitors and a major cyberattack.】

item.title: 马杜罗与中国的 "完美联盟 "隐藏着深刻的经济裂痕
item.description: 被推翻的委内瑞拉领导人尼古拉斯-马杜罗可能比唐纳德-特朗普更能掏空中国在其经济中的存在。【原文：Ousted Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro may have done more to hollow out China’s presence in his economy than Donald Trump ever could.】

item.title: 香港豪宅以 1.33 亿美元售出，十年间增值 25
item.description: 香港著名的山顶区一栋豪宅以 10.4 亿港元（1.33 亿美元）的价格售出，为持有该豪宅约十年的业主带来了超过 25% 的收益。【原文：A mansion at Hong Kong’s prestigious Peak area was sold for HK$1.04 billion ($133 million), yielding a more than 25% gain for the owner who held it for about a decade.】

item.title: 沙特股市因对市场进一步自由化寄予厚望而攀升
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯王国向所有外国投资者开放股票市场后，该国股市攀升，在这个海湾国家寻求促进海外投资之际，这一举措被视为实现市场全面自由化的关键。【原文：Saudi Arabian equities climbed after the kingdom opened up its stocks to all foreign investors, a step viewed as critical toward a full liberalization of the market as the Gulf nation looks to boost investment from abroad.】

item.title: 印尼今年可能没收 500 万公顷非法土地
item.description: 印度尼西亚计划再收回数百万公顷其认为被非法使用的土地，加强对其庞大的资源部门的监督。【原文：Indonesia plans to reclaim millions more hectares of land that it deems is being used illegally, intensifying a campaign to tighten oversight of its vast resources sector.】

item.title: 中国开始对日本芯片制造材料进行反倾销调查
item.description: 中国商务部在一份声明中说，中国对从日本进口的二氯硅烷发起反倾销调查，这是一种用于芯片制造工艺的材料。【原文：China launched an anti-dumping probe into imports from Japan of dichlorosilane, a material used in the chipmaking process, the Ministry of Commerce said in a statement.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧分销商请求法院阻止 23 亿美元的朝日交易
item.description: 法院文件显示，帝亚吉欧集团肯尼亚子公司的一家经销商要求东非国家的一家法院暂停向朝日集团控股有限公司出售股份的提议，以待早前一起案件的解决。【原文：A distributor of Diageo Plc’s Kenyan subsidiary asked a court in the East African nation to suspend a proposed share sale to Asahi Group Holdings Ltd. pending the resolution of an earlier case, court filings show.】

item.title: 竞争激烈、需求疲软，宜家将关闭中国七家门店
item.description: 宜家家居将关闭其在中国的七家标志性蓝盒子家具店，转而经营规模较小的门店，因为这家瑞典零售商正在努力应对中国房地产的长期低迷和本地竞争对手日益激烈的竞争。【原文：IKEA will shutter seven of its signature blue-box furniture stores across China and pivot to smaller outlets, as the Swedish retailer grapples with the country’s prolonged property slump and rising competition from local rivals.】

item.title: 中国的限制令日本别无选择，只能向美国寻求帮助
item.description: 日本对中国最新出口管制措施的反应很可能是谨慎的，这既反映出日本报复的选择有限，也反映出日本不希望与其最大贸易伙伴本已紧张的关系升级。【原文：Japan’s response to China’s latest export controls is likely to be cautious, reflecting both limited options for retaliation and a lack of appetite to escalate an already fraught relationship with its largest trading partner.】

item.title: 富时指数有望结束三日涨势
